about_the_game:
Ever wanted to take your Steering Wheel for a ride? Now you can!

With the this free DLC you now have full control over your Steering Wheel like never before!

(Tested & working for Logitech G920 & G29. May work with other steering wheels but has not been tested)

*This is a Windows only DLC and will not work on Mac or Linux*

content_descriptors.notes: The base iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition is intended for an adult purpose.

detailed_description:
Ever wanted to take your Steering Wheel for a ride? Now you can!

With the this free DLC you now have full control over your Steering Wheel like never before!

(Tested & working for Logitech G920 & G29. May work with other steering wheels but has not been tested)

*This is a Windows only DLC and will not work on Mac or Linux*
name: iVIBRATE Ultimate Edition - Steering Wheel Support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • Sound Card: N/A
  • Additional Notes: Will more than likely work on requirements less than this.

short_description: Ever wanted to take your Steering Wheel for a ride? Now you can! With the this free DLC you now have full control over your Steering Wheel like never before!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Latin America, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
